text:
1. Plan your experience

With our numerous Hollywood club connections we can lead your own private group crawl to where you want to go. You choose the clubs, you choose the times and we do the rest. No matter what type of group event you're planning, we’ll work with you to make it a night to remember for all involved. We'll set you up with your own private host, to guide you through out the night and handle all entrances to the best clubs in Hollywood. Email us for a complete list of the clubs we work with.

2. Get your private link

Ask about setting up a private link just for your group. The event title, agenda and details will be personalized just for you. Use this new ticket link to send in your party invites to make organizing your crew as easy as possible.

3. Buy your ticket

Private group crawls require a minimum of 10 people and tickets are $45 per person. This includes your own private host and the clubs and route you choose. Contact us to review a list of clubs we work with on your selected date. New to Hollywood? Tell us the night you envision and our staff will assemble a line up to meet your expectations. We will also design your own personal ticket link to send in your invites to friends.

4. Dress to kill

If there's one thing Hollywood nightclubs are known for, it's all about who can you impress. So do your best to stand out in the city of stars and dress the part for your LA club crawl. You never know who you might meet on Hollywood boulevard's Walk of Fame.

5. Meet your personal host

Our hosts are there to be the responsible one so you don't have to. No matter how large or small your group, our personable staff will guide you into each of the Hollywood nightclubs on your agenda. All you have to do is show up and let them handle the rest. Well plan, you party.

6. Start your party

This night really is all about you and your group and having the best time possible. Nasstive Entertainment prides ourselves on delivering on exactly what we promise. Take the hassle out of going out in Hollywood and let our crew guide you through to the last call at 2 a.m. As local partiers ourselves, will even point you in the right direction for some late night eats.
title: Hollywood Club Crawl

meta_data.description: 4 Clubs / 1 Night / $25! Join 50 to 100+ guests as our hosts escort you to four different venues with VIP entry. Your best night out in Hollywood!
